ai-tha-ap288:1.3_0: of the great dragon kings, of great power,
ai-tha-ap288:2.3_0: I’ve given a gift to my nurse.
ai-tha-ap288:3.1_0: Having received it from the Sambuddha, the Awakened One,
ai-tha-ap288:3.2_0: she presented her to the great Sage.
ai-tha-ap288:3.3_0: and get up from his seat,
ai-tha-ap288:4.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap288:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap288:4.4_0: or the fruition of the rainy season.
ai-tha-ap288:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Utka.
